content: NEW YORK  Sept 12 Energen Corp on Tuesday sought guidance from an Alabama court on the state's shareholder rights laws which an activist investor had said it would use to force a sale of the U.S. oil and gas producer  a regulatory filing shows.
name: Energen Corporation
title: Energen seeks court ruling on investor rights as funds push for sale

content: Sept 14 Activist investor Corvex Management LP said it would go ahead with its plan to get Energen Corp's investors to vote on its proposals and called the company's decision to seek court's guidance on Alabama's shareholder rights law a "distraction".
name: Energen Corporation
title: Corvex firm on investor vote after Energen seeks court ruling

content: HOUSTON  Jan 7 More icy weather is expected this week in the Permian Basin of Texas  on the heels of freezes that snarled truck traffic  caused power outages and disrupted oil and gas work last week  the National Weather Service said on Wednesday.
name: Energen Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-Another cold blast seen for Permian oil patch in Texas
